anya-e1001n6:5: Gavaṁ ce taramānānaṁ, ujuṁ gacchati puṅgavo;
anya-e1001n6:6: Sabbā gāvī ujuṁ yanti, nette ujuṁ gate sati.
anya-e1001n6:9: So sace dhammaṁ carati, pageva itarā pajā.
anya-e1001n6:10: Gavaṁ ce taramānānaṁ, ujuṁ gacchati puṅgavo;
anya-e1001n6:11: Sabbā gāvī ujuṁyanti, nette ujuṁ gate sati.
anya-e1001n6:13: So sace dhammaṁ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
anya-e1001n6:14: Sabbaṁ raṭṭhaṁ sukhaṁ seti, rājā ce hoti dhammiko.
